name: Ticking Down
description:
Time is always ticking down! When it hits 0 you lose control and take damage. Can you make it to the end?

This game was made in 48 hours for GMTK Game Jam 2020, with the theme Out of Control.

Made by Ben Mudd

Assets used were not mine:

https://adamatomic.itch.io/cavernas

https://0x72.itch.io/16x16-industrial-tileset
